title: Blessings of the Daily: A Monastic Book of Days
description: Following the cycle of the seasons and the Church year, Brother Victor offers a brief meditation for each day of the year that begins with a quote from Scripture or a relevant author followed by a reflection that leads readers to find the spiritual in the fabric of their daily lives. 464-page hardcover; 5-3/4 x 8-1/2
author: Victor-Antoine D'Avila-Latourrette
